answerText: Republic of Azerbaijan [10] Azerbaijan is home to this enclave with a majority Armenian population. It saw several massacres of Azeris and Armenians during the late 1980s, and its larget city is Stepanakert.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Minnesota A and Dartmouth A and South Detroit University | 11 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Various sources on THE INTERNET indicate that this country's city of Xachmaz will be a great vacation spot for tourists interested in seeing mosques and tombs. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this country home to Lake Goy-gol and Maral-gol. Its capital is the noted cosmopolitan city Baku.
